General.Name: Indofood Agri Resources Ltd
General.Description: Indofood Agri Resources Ltd. engages in a vertically integrated agribusiness company in Singapore and internationally. The company operates in two segments: Plantations, and Edible Oils and Fats. It engages in the research and development of oil palm seed breeding, crude palm oil production and refining, cultivates and markets palm plantations, rubber, sugar cane, cocoa, tea, and industrial timber plantation activities. The Plantations segment develops and maintains oil palm, rubber, and sugar cane plantations, and other business activities relating to processing, marketing, and selling. The Edible Oils and Fats segment produces, markets, and sells edible oil, margarine, shortening, and other related and derivative products. It offers cooking oil under the Bimoli, Bimoli Spesial, Delima, Amanda, and Happy brands; and margarine and shortening products under the Amanda, Palmia, Royal Palmia, Simas, Malinda, and Delima brands. Indofood Agri Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Singapore. Indofood Agri Resources Ltd. is a subsidiary of Indofood Singapore Holdings Pte. Ltd.
General.Address: 8 Eu Tong Sen Street, Singapore, Singapore, 059818
